snippet: A judge on Wednesday ended a showdown that had threatened to leave the city unable to pay its bills as early as Friday.
abstract: Judge William Collette throws out a legal challenge to an agreement intended to spare Detroit from financial ruin, ending a showdown that had threatened to leave the city unable to pay its bills.
lead_paragraph: A judge on Wednesday ended a showdown that had threatened to leave the city unable to pay its bills as early as Friday.

headline.main: Michigan: Judge Dismisses Lawsuit Challenging Detroit Solvency Deal
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Judge Dismisses Lawsuit Challenging Detroit Solvency Deal
